short_summary: Maintenance and Support for Symantec Software and Related Technical Specifications
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Summary

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting qualified vendors to submit a proposal for the purchase of maintenance and support for Symantec software and related technical specifications.

#### Details

* **Tender Reference**: SSC-24-00026448:T
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM021279/26448
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-07
* **Closing Date and Time**: 2024-05-20T14:00:00
* ** Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G and S)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

#### Solicitation Description

The SSC is seeking qualified vendors to provide maintenance and support for Symantec software and related technical specifications. Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit their proposal.

#### How to Register

To register, please visit the SSC P2P portal website at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click on the "Register Now" button.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications, please contact Clara Whittaker at [343-553-8354](tel:343-553-8354) or [180 Kent Ottawa, K1P 0B6, Canada](mailto:clara.whittaker@sscppc.ca).

#### Documents

The solicitation documents, including this notice and all amendments, can be accessed on the SSC P2P portal website at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/AE63B481-6C5C-4D1E-AE80-0E3C4F841CBC](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/AE63B481-6C5C-4D1E-AE80-0E3C4F841CBC). Paper copies will not be provided. Three black lines to add a line of separation. 

*PNND* 

*This
